text: Lasianthus varians is a species of plant in the family Rubiaceae. It is endemic to Sri Lanka. ==Sources== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Lasianthus varians. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. Category:Flora of Sri Lanka varians Category:Endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Lasianthus varians
